channel.title: Java error! server/client problem!
channel.description:
Hello, I've had a very confusing problem lately, I have a brand new computer (1 week old) I can play runescape, and rsps clients, and it works fine I can compile(proves I did my java paths right) And When i HOST only when I'm the one hosting this happens! (this means I can play on any server)
K well, when I turn on my server log onto the client, click a NPC or click anywhere on the map, it will simple just x out the client, I have no idea how to fix, I'm using windows 7 64bit, I have jdk 6update21, and java 6update16 I was testing, If you can help please help on here, or add my msn, Lmbuehrer12@live.com, thanks in advanced! (I've tried on all other communitys, and none of them helped much!) ;/

item.title: Java error! server/client problem!
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

ive fixed this issue on 64 bits before windows 7 also so if you would like, pm me and i will try to help you if you can download teamviewer and pm me your ID and PASS and ill try to reach you asap hopefully ill be able to fix it as ive worked with 64 bits alot and mine is 64bit atm and i run a server and client and no problems

Read full topic

item.title: Java error! server/client problem!
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

the 64bit is the problem
… shoulda gotr 32bit

64bit is to high for the client. it overloads it. i had a 64bit and discovered this myself. not saying all, but MOST
64bits do this

Read full topic
